Plant IT¶

Plant IT empowers computational researchers to make their algorithms available to a broad community, and provides biological researchers with an easy-to-use interface to apply the algorithms to their own data.

  • System Overview
    • Workflows
    • Collections and Samples
    • Systems
    • File Locations
    • Docker Containers
    • Remote File System Support

  • Server Configuration

Plant IT Package¶

The plantit package (django/plantit/) contains the back end code for the website

  • plantit package
    • plantit.celery module
    • plantit.settings module
    • Subpackages
      • plantit.collection package
      • plantit.file_manager package
      • plantit.job_manager package
      • plantit.user package
      • plantit.workflows package

Front End APIs¶

The apis package (django/apis/) is build atop the django rest framework and provides a bridge between the front-end code (django/front-end) and the back end (django/plantit) code.

  • apis package
    • Subpackages
      • apis.file_manager package
      • apis.job_manager package
      • apis.workflows package
    • Submodules
    • apis.mixins module
